Orange: Do the Mannequin Challenge and send the video in the group chat!
Yellow: Do something wild, unexpected, or one-of-a-kind!
Green: Take a selfie with a stranger!
Purple: Find a stranger to ask for the funniest Cypriot word they can think of, then record yourselves saying it together.
